0xD1A70C1E8D1031FE.name: _SET_PLAYER_PICKUP_PROMPT_VISIBLE
0xD1A70C1E8D1031FE.comment: Shows or hides all Pick Up prompts for the specified player, including the prompt for picking up hats from the ground. When set to true, the player will see Pick Up prompts for all nearby items. If set to false, all Pick Up prompts will be hidden.
